response.overview: Dinis lives in Sabugueiro, at the foot of the majestic Serra da Estrela mountains in northern Portugal. He discovered his love of nature and animals at an early age. In his free time—on weekends and during school holidays—he devotedly tends to his flock of sheep, which he leads into the mountains. There, he feels a deep connection to nature and a sense of freedom.
response.title: Der letzte Hirte von Sabugueiro
